item.title: 700 Club Interactive - February 26th, 2026
item.description: Steve Amerson, a renowned vocalist and Hollywood session singer, reflects on his faith and journey from the stage to the halls of power, as well as his foundation, The Word on the Hill, today on The 700 Club Interactive.

item.title: 700 Club Interactive - February 25th, 2026
item.description: Layla Nahavandi grew up in a Muslim home. One day, she watched her mother give her life to Christ, and she soon followed. Now, see how God is using her in powerful ways, today on The 700 Club Interactive.

item.title: 700 Club Interactive - February 24th, 2026
item.description: For Betty and Phoebe Kilby, their story of racial reconciliation is personal; they are cousins, united by slavery. See their beautiful story today on the 700 Club Interactive.

item.title: 700 Club Interactive - February 23rd, 2026
item.description: Content Creator and Author Kendall Mariah will talk about her debut book "This Little Fire of Mine"and how to embrace the uncomfortable and big questions and deepen your faith, Today on the 700 Club Interactive.

item.title: 700 Club Interactive - February 19th, 2026
item.description: Dr. Christine Darden broke ground not only as a woman of color, but also as one of NASA's female mathematician and aerospace engineers. Witness her incredible story and her faith that propelled her to succeed, today on the 700 Club Interactive.

item.title: 700 Club Interactive - February 18th, 2026
item.description: Hosanna Wong comes back to the 700 Club Interactive to share her testimony and roadblocks she's faced, revealing how God taught her to overcome them and enjoy life again in her new book, Uncomplicate It.

item.title: 700 Club Interactive - February 16th, 2026
item.description: One stomach virus led to 15 months of relentless nausea, pain, and no answers from doctors. Desperate, her family drove her 16 hours to a camp meeting. Watch as healing followed, today on the 700 Club Interactive.
